member.name: P:SpinitTest.Queries.PagedListQuery.OrderBy
member.summary:
**Order by** _Example_: * population desc, slugstate desc, id * id desc * year, id
___desc = descending___
There are alot of other properties you can order by

member.name: P:SpinitTest.Queries.PagedListQuery.PageNumber
member.summary:
**Page Number** _Example_: If your total count in your response header is 20 and
your page size is 10, then the other 10 is in page number 2.
Default is 1

member.name: P:SpinitTest.Queries.PagedListQuery.PageSize
member.summary:
**Page Size** _Example_: Select the amount of items you want to be displayed in each page
In order to get all data without pagination, set PageSize = 0
Defalut is 10

member.name: P:SpinitTest.Queries.StateQuery.IdYear
member.summary: **Id of the year for that state** _Example_: 2020

member.name: P:SpinitTest.Queries.StateQuery.Year
member.summary: **Year/Years you want a set of data from** _Example_: 2020 or 2018, 2019, 2020 (must be comma separated)
